General.Name: Phihong Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Phihong Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of power supply products in Taiwan, rest of Asia, the Americas, Europe, and internationally. The company operates through Power Supply Products and EV Energy Products segments. It offers AC/DC power adapters, AC and DC chargers, charging modules, power supply modules, uninterruptible power supply for computers, ballasts, etc. The company also offers job-site radio and bluetooth speakers, and e-motive chargers. The company was formerly known as Phihong Enterprise Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Phihong Technology Co., Ltd. in June 2003. Phihong Technology Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1972 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.568, Fuxing 3rd Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 33383
